topic.title: Why is the SETI institute looking for intelligent life on other planets?
topic.body: Shouldn't they try to find intelligent life on earth first?

topic.title: Central bankers are the world heavyweight champions of theft
topic.body: The only real thing they are doing is stealing. Either through inflation or by looking in order books and doing the opposite than you - (Shorting when you go long and vice versa)

topic.title: [Opinion] Using crypto to earn a passive income is better than "Hodling" BTC
topic.body: While the majority of crypto owners simply buy and "hodl" ( waiting weeks, months, years, perhaps forever for the price to rise in fiat ) i prefer using cryptocurrency as a tool to generate a passive income by participating in Proof of Stake.

topic.title: The EUssr is going to enact new laws in January 2020 to destroy crypto startups and its adoption
Greece is planning a new cash-ban-asshole-law in 2020
topic.body:
https://fortune.com/2019/12/16/greece-digital-economy-cashless-fines/

I expect similar laws in other EU countries soon too.

1558691316_15Gk4wzjyNbPU3JZ31UnqMM3CMrX8.body:
I know plenty of websites on which the cookie consent / privacy policy banner re-appear once in a week even if you gave consent earlier. The GDPR is harassment. It is useless and has made the online experience much worse. 

The EU is a centralized mega surveillance state and i hope it will die a horrible death. 

Congratulations Great Britain for Brexit !

1576643812_1G79HnSxfCixN2HD2jP1Zabs1B8xz.body: i like but bitcoin and crypto but the whole space has been polluted with institutional crooks at least since late 2017 who are waiting for newbies to enter the market and rip them off, that's why i think that Bitcoin won't even reach its ATH anytime soon perhaps never again

1576761563_1G79HnSxfCixN2HD2jP1Zabs1B8xz.body: The government and banker crooks can 'suppress' the price by simply allowing future contracts on them which they already did. Let the losers play roulette against each other so no one will make any profits on the long run except the bank that charges a fee for every order.

But hey governments, continue to quarantine everyone in ships, large buildings and make sure everybody quarantined will get infected.
